GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

exampleResponse.title: Jenga
exampleResponse.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

GET /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: responds with array of comments ordered by date

exampleResponse.body: My dog loved this game too!
exampleResponse.author: mallionaire

POST /api/reviews/:review_id/comments.description: accepts a comment object and responds with posted comment object

requestBody.body: I enjoy playing this game every time and wit the usual suspects

exampleResponse.body: I enjoy playing this game every time and wit the usual suspects
exampleResponse.author: mallionaire

PATCH : /api/reviews/:review_id.description: updates review votes acording to passed object

GET: /api/users.description: responds with an array of users

DELETE: /api/comments/:comment_id.description: delete coment by id responds with no content
